title: Spirit guard udyr audio glitch
body: There is a glitch i have noticed with the spirit guard udyr skin in which any form you press into there is the CAW audio track played, instead of the traditional turtle, tiger, or bear stance audio tracks. It is seemingly a minor bug but to someone who relies on audio heavily hearing a spam of CAW when switching forms this is quite distracting and annoying.

replies.body:
Hey Goldblade709,

Sorry about this. D: Thanks for the report, we'll look into getting this issue resolved!
